text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: The Selection Race is tomorrow…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry for making you wait… 
But just wait… a little longer…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I will definitely win tomorrow, then I will have my debut 
race… Then I will dedicate many, many wins to you.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Your big sister will do her best.

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: Was it you…?

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text:
Was it you that wanted to race so badly? Was it you that wanted 
to win so badly? Was it you that had so much fun? And… was it 
you that felt so lonely…?

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: Was that all you? Hey…

The day of Admire Vega's Selection Race has finally 
arrived. Many trainers were gathered in the audience, 
their eyes full of anticipation.
I'm also very excited to see Admire Vega's race…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I will definitely win.
After last night, I couldn't help but worry about her.
choice_data_list: I… have a bad feeling about this.

text_block_list.text: But despite these concerns, the race began without a hitch!
(Woooooh!!)

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Hah, hahh, haa—

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I will win… I have to win.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
That time, I later found out that it could have 
been me or her that ended up as the sacrifice.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I lived merely by pure chance. Or perhaps… 
My life was simply a miracle left to me by my little sister.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: So!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
They are finally rounding the fourth corner and entering 
into the final straight! Number 9 is breaking out from 
the group and taking a great lead. The favorite for 
this race, Admire Vega, is in 5th place!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Hahh, haa, guuuh…!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Admire Vega seems to be surrounded…! 
Did she not manage to get into a good position?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: No… No! I won't be forgiven for doing anything other than winning!! But, I…!!

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text:
You… really loved running, huh? 
You really wanted to race, and to win, didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: Then, if that's the case… I…

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: I'll grant you your wish.

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: Your big sister… will…!!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I will continue running, I will continue winning! And I will continue to bring glory to her!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: The only reason. The only reason that I am alive is for this!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: …… Aaaaaaaaahh!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Admire Vega is quickly and nimbly cutting through the pack and 
pushing forward! 3rd place, 2nd place, and 1st place! What 
magnificently explosive power!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Eh? Wait, what was…

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
And goal!! The winner of this selection 
race is Admire Vega! Admire Vega has won!

That terrifying speed that she showed at the end of the final 
straight. The onlookers were so moved by the force of it all that 
they couldn't help but cheer.
Then came an unsettling sound.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Haah, haahh, haaaah—

text_block_list.name: Selection Race Official A
text_block_list.text:
This is an announcement regarding the most recent race. Due to 
her diagonal movement in the final straight, Admire Vega has been 
lowered to 4th place.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Haa… gh……

That day, no trainer reached out to 
Admire Vega and she left the venue, alone.
